Project "New Telemachus GUI"

EXPERIMENTAL - This is a prototype.

This addon to the addon "Telemachus" gives you the most important controls on another screen.

You may either use a dual-head setup or display the cockpit on a second computer.

Features:

All controls in the screenshot are working, except the "KILL ROT" button. The "software" running in both MFD units is rudimentary as of version proto1.3. It provides an artificial horizon and few non-interactive info screens (like orbit- and target data, vehicle status, altitudes, etc.).

Download:

https://github.com/hwirth/ntgui/archive/master.zip

Install:

Extract the contents of the ZIP file and copy the ntgui-master folder to

/GameData/Telemachus/Plugins/PluginData/Telemachus/ntgui-master

Your Telemachus web page just got extended.

Call the new GUI with:

http://<ip-address>:8085/telemachus/ntgui-master/cockpit.html

Future Plans

My next goal is to add some graphical representation of the current orbit in the MFDs and make the MFD menus more useful. As of now, the cursor keys and Cancel/Enter are just decoration.

Another goal is to learn how to recompile Telemachus in order to make it deliver a few more data points (Like positions of prograde indicators etc).
